system.description: The character strikes in a blur of punches, kicks and webbing.
system.effect: The character splits their attack to make two close attacks against separate targets within reach (or they can focus a single attack on a single target). Make a single Melee check and compare it to the targets' Melee defenses. On a success, the affected target takes half regular damage. On a Fantastic success, the affected target takes full damage and is paralyzed by webbing. Breaking free from webbing requires a Melee check (target number 20).After the attacks, the character may run, jump or climb at half speed for free.
